name: Underground Factory Dude
description:
WIP / EARLY ACCESS PLEASE WAIT FOR THE FINAL VERSION

He hated people so much that he became a hermit.

Due to his aged body tho he lost muscle movement and the marvelous actions he could perform in his youth.

After meditating a lot he came up with an incredible solution! He invented machines/factories that produced the actions his body couldn't and connected them to himself!

There were evil forces tho D:< that wanted his invention and so they started coming in waves D:

  • WASD to move
  • LEFT CLICK to attack
  • RIGHT CLICK to dash
  • F to build factories
